question: A carpenter works for 5 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid $200 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The carpenter works for 6 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<6*5=30>>30 days/month
If he earns $200 every day he then earns $200/day * 30 days/month = $<<200*30=6000>>6000/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $6000/month * 12 months/year = $<<6000*12=72,000>>72,000
#### 72,000
